name: The Last of the Summer Tank
name_original: The Last of the Summer Tank
description:
During the last phase of World War 2, a German tank crew driving the mighty Tiger fought their way back to the ruined Berlin desperately trying to save the Third Reich. On the way, they need to overcome the challenge of endless allies' tanks and defeat the ultimate evil tank that is "Big Mac" KV-2.


Use gold to unlock a wide range of tanks


Upgrade

Use coins from destroying enemies to upgrade your tank

Buffs

Spitfire
Cause damage to the enemy in front of you


Increase Rate of Fire
Decrease the reload time by 50%


Doble Points
Doubling the coins and gold from destroying enemy


Nuke
Destroy the normal enemy near you and cause a certain amount of damage to the big enemy

Final Boss
